overview: In the beginning of everything there was nothing and nothing was everything. The beginning of life; first an egg and then a human. A being created with a glowing red core. Will it decide to shine in harmony with the light or succumb to the terror of darkness? It has awakened. Man and animal. Animal and man. Only one can live in his mind. Or will he be able to live with both in peace?
tagline: Light and darkness... will there be a way to live in harmony?
title: Twilight
